column5: The Big Bend is at your doorstep. Enjoy a private, fully furnished 500 square foot apartment with a bedroom, patio, comfortable living, bath and kitchen area. Some of the area's best restaurants, galleries and shopping are within a few blocks.   Alpine is centrally located and ideal for a visit to Marfa, Big Bend National Park, Fort Davis and Marathon.   If you are planning a trip with a large group of friends, the White Brush Suite and the Nopal Suite can be booked together and accommodate 7.
